titleStmt.title: The sleepy spouse of Christ alarm'd, or, A warning to beware of drowsiness vvhen Christ calls, lest he withdraw in a discontent being the sum of some sermons upon Cant. 5th, and the beginning / by J. B., minister of the Gospel ; recommended in a preface by Nath. Vincent.
titleStmt.author: J. B. (James Bradshaw), 1636?-1702.
Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: imprint cropped and pages faded with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
